Taliyah.name: Taliyah
Taliyah.title: the Stoneweaver
Taliyah.lore: Taliyah is a nomadic mage from Shurima, torn between teenage wonder and adult responsibility. She has crossed nearly all of Valoran on a journey to learn the true nature of her growing powers, though more recently she has returned to protect her tribe. Some have mistaken her compassion for weakness and paid the ultimate priceâ€”for beneath Taliyah's youthful demeanor is a will strong enough to move mountains, and a spirit fierce enough to make the earth itself tremble.
Taliyah.blurb: Taliyah is a nomadic mage from Shurima, torn between teenage wonder and adult responsibility. She has crossed nearly all of Valoran on a journey to learn the true nature of her growing powers, though more recently she has returned to protect her tribe...
allytips: Try to throw enemies into Unraveled Earth using Seismic Shove.
Remember, you don't always have to ride Weaver's Wall.
Once you have Rylai's Crystal Scepter, casting Threaded Volley at enemies chasing you is a great way of making them regret everything.
enemytips: When Taliyah casts Unraveled Earth in the lane, be on the lookout for Seismic Shove. If she throws you into her minefield, the throws and stones will break your bones.
Taliyah's Threaded Volley is locked into a direction. If she's throwing rocks at you, dodge to the side!

spells.name: Threaded Volley
spells.description: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
spells.tooltip:
Taliyah hurls 5 rocks, each dealing {{ rockdamage }} magic damage to the first enemy hit. Subsequent hits against the same enemy deal reduced damage.

Taliyah also weakens nearby earth for {{ e6 }} seconds. Using this Ability on weak earth instead hurls one rock, but only costs {{ e7 }} Mana.

spells.name: Seismic Shove
spells.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
spells.tooltip: Taliyah quakes the earth, dealing <magicDamage>{{ totaldamage }} magic damage</magicDamage> in an area and <status>Knocking Back</status> enemies toward a chosen direction.

spells.name: Unraveled Earth
spells.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
spells.tooltip:
Taliyah scatters loose stones in an area, dealing {{ scatterdamage }} magic damage and Slowing enemies hit by {{ totalslow }}. After {{ e3 }} seconds the stones shatter, dealing the damage again.

Enemies that dash or are Knocked through the stones detonate them, taking {{ detonationdamage }} magic damage for each stone they pass through (max 4). Stones beyond the first deal reduced damage.

spells.name: Weaver's Wall
spells.description: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
spells.tooltip: Taliyah creates a massive earthen wall for {{ e1 }} seconds. If she immediately <recast>Recasts</recast> she will ride along it as it unravels. Moving or taking damage will end the ride.

passive.name: Rock Surfing
passive.description: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.
